list.title: isNarcissisticNumber
list.description:
A Narcissistic Number is a number of length l in which the sum of its digits to the power of l is equal to the original number. If this seems confusing, refer to the example below.

Ex: 153, where l = 3 ( the number of digits in 153 ) 13 + 53 + 33 = 153

list.title: rockPaperScissor
list.description:
Lets play a game. Rock Paper Scissors.

This function will check which is the winner of the game, based on the options:

  • "r" for rock;
  • "p" for paper;
  • "s" for scissor;

And determines the winner:

  • 0 for draw
  • 1 for player 1
  • 2 for player 2
